author: easilar
body:
#### PR description:

The aim of the PR is to add histograms and organise output folder structure of TAU DQM miniAOD validation. Plan for future PRs is to remove standard validation completely or set up a conditional plotting.Further documentation can be found here: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/SWGuidePFTauIDValidation


#### PR validation:

The changes have been tested with ZTT RelVal samples by producing DQM samples via cmsDriver comments. It is confirmed that histograms are created in correct form and folders are structured as desired.
Then, the instructions of https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html (see [*]) have been followed.

[*]
cd src
scram b distclean
git cms-checkdeps -a -A
scram b -j 10
scram b runtests
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos
title: From cmssw 11 0 0
